com.nitor.dux.common.util

Class ExcelOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nitor.dux.common.util.ExcelOperations

  • public class ExcelOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines methods for retrieving content from excel in various formats. At present the support is for Excel 2007 and above.
    Author:
    anup.manekar

      • readExcel

        public static java.util.List<java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>> readExcel(java.lang.String fileName,
                                                                                             java.lang.String sheetName,
                                                                                             java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> filterCondition)
        Return excel content in form of row-column matrix
        Parameters:
        fileName - - Excel filename to be read
        sheetName - - Sheet within excel to be read. This is not sheet index but sheet name.
        filterCondition - - Any filter condition (ColName:Value) to be used while retrieving data.
        Returns:
